data.title: International Student Services Office
data.meta_description: Location Language of Instruction Open to Level of Study Tokyo, Japan Japanese, English All Faculties Undergraduate Fields of Study In English: Literature;
data.text:
Location Language of Instruction Open to Level of Study Tokyo, Japan Japanese, English All Faculties Undergraduate

Fields of Study

In English: Literature; Education, Psychology and Human Studies; Economics; Law; Business; International Politics, Economics and Communication; Cultural and Creative Studies. In Japanese: Science & Engineering; Social Informatics; Community Studies

Requirements

Minimum 2.5 GPA out of a 4.0 scale. This is equivalent to a B-.

Term Dates

Fall Term Winter Term September to January (Fall semester) March to July (Spring semester)

*The information provided on this page is subject to change. Please consult the Host Institution’s factsheet, the Host Institution’s website, or the Host Institution directly to confirm.
